name: Manilla in Pocket Wonder
description:
Eng: Manilla makes an adventure in Pocket Wonder's net-cube, it's like in Wonder Race, only everything is in 2D and in a minimalist side-scroller.

Overcome the obstacles and collects the qdatas as fast as possible until reach from the goal.

This game is an experimental project made on the Pocket Platformer engine, based on the game in development Randy & Manilla.

Esp: Manilla hace una aventura en la net-cube de Pocket Wonder, es como en Wonder Race, solo que todo es en 2D y en side-scroller minimalista.

Supera los obstáculos y recoge los qdatas lo más rápido posible hasta alcanzar al de la meta.

Este juego es un proyecto experimental hecho en el motor Pocket Platformer, basado en el juego en desarrollo Randy y Manilla.

How to play:

· Required browsers to play: Mozilla Firefox & Chromium (Chrome, Edge, Opera, Brave, etc.)

· Left/Rigth arrow buttons: move

(two times: acceleration)

· Up arrow button: jump/talk

· X key button: dash

· (Refresh the browser page if you want replay)

Randy & Manilla page link: https://ofihombre.itch.io/randy-manilla

Pocket Plafformer link: https://the-l0bster.itch.io/pocket-platformer

Soundtrack by Marcus Wood: https://bandcamp.com/randymanilla
